resources.string: I am a senior student who is studying the development of mobile applications. I hope you like the application :D

DISCLAIMER\n\nLoLBuilds isn\'t endorsed by Riot Games and doesn\t reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing League of Legends. League of Legends and Riot Games are trademarks of Riot Games, Inc. League of Legends © Riot Games, Inc.
Here you can change the language

1- In option number one, you can open the menu to access some features (Builds (Default page), Bans, Settings, Help, Contact)

 2- In option number two, you have the option to search for characters by name or by a letter that contains in character name

 3- In option number three, you have the option to filter the characters by their role

 4- In each character you can tap to see the information about the build, which to climb on each level and the runes

 4.1 - If you hold down a character, that character will be added to favorites (it will be seen visually because the character will have a heart in his image in the lower right part) and if the character is already in favorites it will be deleted from favorites
